Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model

Class Bookshelf

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Bookshelf
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Bookshelf extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents the Bookshelf of the game, a 6x5 Matrix of Item elements.
See Also:

      public boolean isEmpty(int i, int j)
      Checks whether the specified position in the Bookshelf is empty or not.
      Parameters:
      i - the row index
      j - the column index
      Returns:
      true if the position is empty, false otherwise

    • insert

      public void insert(int column, ArrayList<Item> pick) throws PickDoesntFitColumnException, PickedColumnOutOfBoundsException
      Inserts the array of items in the specified column of the Bookshelf.
      Parameters:
      column - the column index
      pick - the array of items to insert
      Throws:
      PickDoesntFitColumnException - if the pick doesn't fit in the column
      PickedColumnOutOfBoundsException - if the column index is out of bounds
